page.description: Specify the value to be stored in the field when it is edited using a 'Switch' control and the 'Switch' is in the 'on' position.

section.description: Below is a list control with three fields. The Processed and Delivered fields have two possible values, yes and no. These values are determined by two switches that are defined inside a single form control.

figure.title: A List with a formview using switches

section.description: By default, the 'On value' is set to read 'Yes' for Character data types and 1 for Numeric and Logical data types.
To change the 'On value' simply enter the value should read next to the control.
